* Helper class used to change a child view of a {@link android.widget.RemoteViews presentation * template} at runtime, using the values of fields contained in the screen. * *

Typically used by {@link CustomDescription} to provide a customized autofill save UI. * *

Note: This interface is not meant to be implemented by app developers; only * implementations provided by the Android System can be used in other Autofill APIs.
